name: Mini Paradoxe Eau de Parfum Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Warm Florals..Key Notes: Neroli Bud, White Amber, White Musk..Set Description: Discover Prada's new feminine fragrance, Paradoxe Eau de Parfum, with this travel-size gift set...About the Fragrance: This is a floral, ambery perfume that reinvents freshness with a neroli bud extraction to capture the flowers fresh scent, sensuality with bio-converted amber to reveal a vibrant warmth, and intensity through a revolutionary musk molecule for an intense yet subtle trail...This Set Contains:.- 0.24 oz/ 7 mL Paradoxe Eau de Parfum Mini.- 0.34 oz/ 10 mL Paradoxe Eau de Parfum Travel Size
ingredients: Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water, Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Methyl Anthranilate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate, Ci 17200/Red 33.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to pulse points: wrist, neck, and chest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not find this fragrance special, which was surprising given the hype around it.  It was not unpleasant for me but nothing that knocked my socks off... somewhat bland.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the fragrance so much . Tiny bottle is so cute .

I ordered this perfume on Christmas and it just came today I was so exited to open my package until I realized it was nothing in it. I spent $42.12 for this just for me to get scammed and not my order. This is so unacceptable and I will never order from Sephora again.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for those who love luxury
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume set captures the essence of Pradas bold elegance in a compact form. The fragrance blends floral and amber notes with a fresh twist, creating a versatile and captivating scent. Perfect for those who love luxury in a portable size, the Mini Paradoxe set is ideal for on-the-go sophistication or gifting. Its chic packaging reflects Pradas signature aesthetic, making it as much a pleasure to display as to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and a great value it was a Christmas present for my daughter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Long lasting. Received many compliments! Would recommend to anyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like its soft and sweet combination, It is a nice detail for those of us who like perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good deal containing the purse size spray of 0.33 oz and the mini dabber of 0.23oz.  It is definitely a warm floral that is quite potent at first but then dries down to a beautiful fresh clean elegant fragrance that is just slightly powdery in my opinion .  Very pleased!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my collection
reviews.review_text: I just received samples and this smells yummy!!!! Im definitely getting the large size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bottles are very cute, and love the fragrance, Definable getting a full size of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased a mini splash off eBay to test the scent and loved it to get this set. Upon comparison, I believe I have a fake as the P is off, no sticker, less refined seams on the sides of the bottle and the plunger/dabber mechanism is completely different. Upon arrival, the box had a lovely scent but much different from what I had believed was the scent. The small splash had leaked some and there was black residue that appeared to be from the lid floating at the top corners and when I used my fingers to wipe the liquid around the lid. Ironically aside from the residue, I enjoy the dupe more. There is a overall roundness in scent after the dry down that mimics PP but they are different enough. The bevel on the fake was nicer on the cap but not enough to not make me feel duped for thinking I could get the real thing for a typical price for the size. I only sort of wish I had more of this fake as the scent is nostalgic for me. I would still have wanted to try this fragrance and glad I did from Sephora and is my first Prada purchase. The travel vial is hearty in my hand and is nice for wanting an all over mist. Bottle is charming next to other minis. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair
reviews.review_text: While I love the scent, the triangle bottle is not a spray and leaks from the lid. Returned for a different set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my friends was wearing this and I fell in love so I bought this to go on a mini vacation and Im so happy with my order! The mini spray alone is 35$ so the mini Prada bottle is like a buy one get one free in my eyes! & actually a very good amount compared to other mini bottles Ive bought. I absolutely love this scent! This is my absolute favorite out of all the Prada scents! Gives floral but grown & sexy all in one! Will absolutely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely light scent, lasts fairly long. Very pleased with purchase.
Just like Prada Candy,  Smells good, just does not last long at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent is okay but the package was leaking when it arrived

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this sent and it's a great price for what you get. if you want something on the sexy side of floral I definitely recommend this!
I purchased this to try after asking a coworker what scent she had on, will be purchasing the full size once I run out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Last year, I received a sample of this fragrance, and I immediately knew that I had to purchase it! I waited to buy the Prada Paradoxe EDP mini set, because it was out of stock for a while. In any case, its now widely available, so I made the purchase this week. I absolutely adore this floral ambery fragrance u2014 it may be my new favorite scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the prefume for the past few days, I can say this is one of the best Floral scents on the market. It's such an intriguing fragrance that manages to blend seamlessly with my body chemistry. I've received so many compliments. I just want to give an shout out to JaNa Craig from Love Island ud83cudfdd  for recommending this scent. Thanks girl u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_title: Just add this one to your collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good! I always receive compliments when Im wearing this fragrance. Its light and flirty! Two coworkers purchased immediately after I walked by them. Love the travel size set! You cant beat two minis for $35.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very good and great value  Only con is that it doesnt last very long on skin  ( 15 mins )  I recommend spraying on clothes instead and smelling in store :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this Perfume set. And its the perfect size to put it in your purse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have worn this scent on a few occasions and I kid you not, every occasion, someone has noticed and commented on how lovely the scent is.   It's your classic blend of sweet, floral, citrus, woody notes making it perfect for everyday wear!   I prefer this over the intense (which is just sweeter version of this).   This mini packaging is adorable too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this duo and it's great for traveling, got lots of compliments as well, then scent is one of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite am so addicted to it day and night ud83dudc9cud83dudc9cud83dudc9c
Definitely one of my favorites smells I like to wear this when going out somewhere nice, or date night.

reviews.review_title: Try it once and you'll never stop using it.
reviews.review_text: The parfum is exquisite! And this little bottles are perfect for the purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think its a great perfume for those who love floral, just personally not for me. However it performs incredibly well, long lasting and well projected. great deal and would still recommend!

very good product definitely recommend to wear on a date or special occasion(youll get many compliments). good price also, you can pour the small one back into the tube with the spray cap so you can use it better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this so so much I did but mine off Amazon but it's such a beautiful smell at first very fruity but a minute or 2 later it's warm and musky and very powerful and empowering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it and have had so many compliments on it and people have asked what Im wearing and said they were going to go out and purchase itu2026 love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite signature scent. My partner has given me so many compliments! Definitely saving up for the bigger bottle next time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume and its a good price too Im pretty sure the travel size itself is 35$ so you get an extra

reviews.review_title: A must have in your perfume collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A cute best smelling perfume. The smell keeps all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely good value! The extra mini is basically free. The scent is like a candy flower field but not overpoweringly sweet. I hope they come out with more sets.

reviews.review_title: Favorite feminine scent for date night
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Being new to fragrance, I tried different perfumes for a few weeks. Prada Paradoxe ended up being my favorite sexy, feminine scent. It turns very vanilla-y, but not too sweet or off-putting. I love wearing this for date night. The 2-for-1 set is a great price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE Prada Paradoxe EDP. I have this EDP set and sometimes layer it with the Intense version of Paradox or Valentino Born in Roma. Definitely one of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got it for my mom she loved would buy again for myself

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Waited for this to come back in stock to order it only for it to be u201cundeliverable.u201d Now I cant even order it again because its out of stock AGAIN! Really wanted this set! Not happy! Not my fault the carrier messed up.

reviews.review_title: A must have in her everyday routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my mom because this is her favorite sent, she loves it and wears it everyday just about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Why do the review photos show cheap packaging but the product photo includes a box with Prada's signature Saffiano leather-inspired texture?  That is super misleading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this scent!!! its long lasting and the sweetness for me is just enough without being overwhelming. this set is also great value!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smelt so sweet on me which isnt really my vibe. It lasts a decent amount of time and I definitely recommend it if you like semi floral candy-ish scents.

reviews.review_title: The newest fragrance to my collection.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An absolutely beautiful scent. I got this set as Valentine's day presents for my mom and myself.  We both love it. A little goes a long way so it will last a really long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite! Sexy, fresh, fruity, and excellent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I first got this product as sample when I purchased other products. I tried it and loved it. That's why I ordered the kit. It's a long lasting scent. If you wear it, everyone will ask about it. Totally recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is radiant & beautiful! Definitely a head turner! I tried it in store once & also got a sample & I knew I had to have it. If you're on a price friendly budget this is the way to go! This was a great price. It's close to 2 for 1! The mini is only 0.11ml smaller than the travel size. There for in the mini you're getting 2/3 of the perfume in the travel sized bottle!

reviews.review_title: Such a great scent and deal
reviews.review_text: For those wondering, the mini is a dabber but the lid from the spray bottle can be undone so you can refill as needed! Was very happy about that because some designer perfume lids will not unscrew.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scents is sophisticated and beautiful, you will definitely be asked what youre wearing. Bought it for my daughters birthday and contemplated keeping it! However I need the BIG bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my mother loved it, great scent for all ages, amazing base notes, not too floral not too fruity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this set is great because the travel size alone is the same amount for the two set here. The reason for 4 stars is because I guess I just wasnt expecting it to be THAT Small but I dont know what i was expecting either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my literal HOLY GRAIL!!! the scent is sweet and spicy. it's smells expensive and ii really recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The travel spray is a spray and has a little cap to take off before you can use it. And the bottle is a dab-on. The fragrance reminds me of YSL Black opium but its more floral and less sweet. To me it has a more sultry and grown up scent in comparison.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the floral scent and it lasts a super long time. Packaging is nice, lid never falls off and it looks nice on my shelf. Travel spray has 10ml, more than I've seen with other travel sprays. Overall good product and great for the price. Makes a super good gift as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a candy floral scent. I wouldnt wear it everyday, but on occasion its nice. I prefer this to other Prada scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very sexy smell, caution! People would stop you to ask you what perfume youre wearing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you, Sephora for including a Prada Paradoxe sample with my Ordinary order last year or so. I hadn't worn scent in decades because many people abuse scent and others have allergies. I fell in love with its soft, sexy, fresh femininity. A tiny squirt lingered on me all day and even after bathing! I ran out, but when I check prices, I was appalled by how expensive fragrance has become since the 1990s. Plus, I never made my way through an entire bottle back in my days of Lauren by Ralph Lauren and Happy by Clinique. When this travel size with the dabber became available, I jumped on it, and I'm so glad I did.    For those whining about the dabber, why?  This set was just a few dollars more than the travel size alone, so I jumped on this great value.  Now I always look for the fragrance samples from Sephora when I place my orders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whew!  This is the 1u2026 Im approached various times of the day. This scent stays with you and Im Loving It!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume and this is such a good deal. The travel bottle (0.33 fl oz) is normally 32 dollars which basically means the 0.23 fl oz bottle is only $3. This is amazing I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Enjoy this Prada scent its sweet floral and fresh and will be buying the larger bottle
Smells good so good. I would definitely recommend purchasing the bigger oz

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: normally I wouldn't blind purchase a perfume, but the reviews left me hopeful... so I did and I am SO GLAD I BOUGHT THIS. it's has a warm expensive smell without the old lady scent!!!!!! 1000000% recomend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is one of my favorite scents yet! It makes me feel beautiful and just plain old good about myself. I step into a room knowing I smell good lol. Best part is you dont need too much of it and it last my full bottle and I am so glad I tried this sample first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume is like no other genuinely. love it so so much for days i want a nice musky, amber-y floral scent. pro tip: layer this with u201cinto the nightu201d from bath and body works and its AMAZING

reviews.review_title: If you like floral, get one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! Was so glad i was able to grab one when they restocked. I also love Kilians Love Dont be Shy but this one may be my new fave. Its like Valentino Voce Viva but less musk. I didnt find the scent too sweet but it def screams sexy and sophisticated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it . It smells amazing . Its strong. It definitely give a very luxurious vibe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to try it this perfume for some time now. So glad I purchased it during the Sephora Sale. Its smells amazing. Definitely purchasing the big bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent so much, smells so girly but expensive !

reviews.review_title: Good scent but hard to handle the small dabber
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent, good value for getting 15ml of it considering the 10ml travel is almost the same price on its own. keep in mind when looking at the photo that the 5ml and the 50ml bottles look alike, this set has the 10ml+5ml, the other more expensive paradox set is the one with the 50ml bottle. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the mini 5ml bottle is easy to spill as its a dabber with a triangle shape and being so small

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It smells amazing and its very long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell, but it rubs off so easily and its so expensive

reviews.review_title: Lovely scent, but the glass shattered so easily :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely adore the scent. The dry down is also gorgeous! However, I wish I had purchased the full size as I was very disappointed with the design of these bottles. The travel spray bottle is made of such fragile glass that it completely shattered after simply getting knocked over on my counter. Would hate to have it shatter in someone's purse or something! As for the little dabber bottle - I must've missed it upon purchasing but I had assumed it was a roller, not just a literal hole lol. Not my ideal application, but oh well! Would definitely recommend buying the full size spray instead right off the bat.
I received my set already opened, and it was missing the little dabber bottle when I opted for the same day delivery option. Im not sure how the person who packed it missed that.
i absolutely love this scent. the moment i smelled it in store i knew i needed to come back to get it. its a very sweet and warm scent and perfect for winter in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has me addicted! In the beginning it is a very warm almost spicy floral. Dry down is a rounded sweetness. Not too much but just enough where I feel like I smell edible lol. Good staying power, and Id say a decent scent trail. Will be buying the full size when Im done with theses.

reviews.review_title: A perfect spicy everyday scent for fall.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much, its just the right balance of musky, spicy, and sweet. Simple enough for everyday use, and long lasting. This is a great deal since its the same price as the travel spray alone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this scent before committing to full size and this set is perfect! I love this floral perfume so much and when Im done, Im definitely going full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this perfume I tried it out so that I could see if I wanted to buy the larger size. Its very good and sexy and fierce smelling makes you feel like a boss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent! So feminine and pretty.

reviews.review_title: Watch Out for the Mini Dabber Bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review is specifically for this set. The value is good, but the mini bottle is designed on an angle and with a stopper, so if you open it, it might just spill everywhere. Its also tricky to put the stopper back in without getting perfume all over the place. So, just a major heads up on that cute mini. Onto the actual scent. I do not recommend this as a blind by. It is a bit strong and depending on your chemistry, could clean a little u201cold lady.u201d Overall, I like this fragrance, but its not my favorite. Its not different or unique enough for me, personally. Definitely go give it a spritz and see how it dries down for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pay no mind to the negative reviews! This scent is very sexy, complex and sophisticated! Im a huge fan of other Prada fragrances but this one was a complete blind purchase and I fell in love the moment that I opened my package and applied it. It is so sexy and I I received many compliments from coworkers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and love the little bottle for display.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels way too expensive for what little you get but it is Prada so I guess thats fine. Love the way this smells though and I am thinking about buying a full bottle when I run out eventualy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A sexy, flirty, delicious scent.  On my skin I get red berries, flowers, a touch of powdery vanilla, and something that borders on a spice note.  I love wearing this out at night.  The dry down is fabulous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: smells amazing, & the price makes it even better. the scent is very between florals & fruity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved the smell of this the first time I tested it. Just got mine in the mail.  Totally worth it seeing as the travel spray alone is $43. So happy with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great value for the price of $35. You get a travel size spray bottle and a mini version of the original bottle which is a dab only bottle. The travel size alone is $32 for me this set is worth the price. Its also a great scent to have in a perfume collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sexy sophisticated scent. I have my mini on my vanity and like to travel with the spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a classic floral perfume, inoffensive, moderate projection and longevity. After 2 hours it's  like a skin scent. Not my cup of tea, but I can use it for some occasions. Travel size is just enough for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great price to build to a travel / mini collection!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The negative reviews are correct, this did have the incorrect amounts listed originally. Customer service couldnt help and it was conveniently removed from the website for the sale. I *love* this perfume but save your money unless you need travel bottles, you are better off saving for the bigger sizes.

reviews.review_title: double check what youre reading smh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: all the previous reviewers dont know how to read lol. there is another set of this that does have the 50ml and 10ml but they did not thoroughly read the title. this title says MINI while the other just says the paradoxe edp set. my god people dont read thoroughly anymore. thats your mistake smh. it irks me when a negative review isnt even based on a product but on the persons lack of common sense.   anyway this smells gorgeous and was surprised how much i loved it. very cozy and sophisticated.
Love the smell but says on the description that the bottle is a 50 ml and its a 7 mlu2026 super disappointed

Super disappointed in this.. original description said it was a 10ML and 50ML bottle.. when I received it in the mail the 50ML bottle was a 7ML and then I discovered it was a dabber.. super disappointed.. will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have 12 mini perfumes, this is adorable and the scent is perfect, im in love with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: a perfect price point I love these for my collection of minis and travels.
Used to be 40$ just a couple weeks ago !!?????????

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sooooo disappointed.. this scent is my Fav.. but, the small triangular bottle fell under my car seat and the top came off. spilled completely (my car smells good). and just yesterday, the little spray bottle fell out of my hand as I was about to apply it, and smashed. (now my bathroom smells great as well). I never got to enjoy these!!!!

reviews.review_title: Wrong description of item.. very misleading
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this thinking its a 30ML plus 50ML as mentioned in the description. However its a 30ML travel size and mini dabber. The description is wrong. It didnt make sense to me at first because the pricing looked way too good to be true. As a 50ML is over $100. The 30ML travel size is $43 on its own.  Anyway Ill be returning this because who wants to pay $10 for a dabber? Not meu2026
